Control Name: Using time-synchronization technology, synchronize all critical system clocks and times and ensure that the following is implemented for acquiring, distributing, and storing time. \n\nNote: One example of time synchronization technology is Network Time Protocol (NTP).

control_attributes.Control: Using time-synchronization technology, synchronize all critical system clocks and times and ensure that the following is implemented for acquiring, distributing, and storing time. \n\nNote: One example of time synchronization technology is Network Time Protocol (NTP).
control_attributes.Requirement: 10.4. Track and monitor all access to network resources and cardholder data
